HomePage.cta: Start tracking and gather all the bundles right now! âœ…
HomePage.description: The Stardew Valley Community Center contains many bundles that need to be collected to restore the building. Our application helps you track progress for each bundle, see which items are already collected, and how many remain until completion. All data is saved locally in your browser, so you can continue tracking at any time.
HomePage.feature1.description: All 6 Community Center rooms and all bundles are available in convenient navigation. Quick access to any room and progress viewing.
HomePage.feature1.title: Everything in one place
HomePage.feature2.description: Mark collected items with one click. Progress is saved automatically and synchronized between sessions.
HomePage.feature2.title: Simple tracking
HomePage.feature3.description: Progress rings show how many items are already collected. Badges with the number of remaining tasks help you quickly understand what else is needed.
HomePage.feature3.title: Visual progress
HomePage.feature4.description: Each item has colored tags indicating the source of acquisition. Easy to understand where to look for needed items.
HomePage.feature4.title: Smart tags
HomePage.feature5.description: Links to Stardew Valley wiki for each item and reward. All necessary information at hand.
HomePage.feature5.title: Detailed information
HomePage.feature6.description: Support for light and dark themes with automatic detection of system settings. Comfortable work at any time of day.
HomePage.feature6.title: Dark theme
HomePage.subtitle: A convenient tool for tracking all bundles and achieving 100% completion
HomePage.title: Track your progress in the Stardew Valley Community Center! ðŸŒ±âœ¨
